artist: Artist: Joe Ollman , et al.; Publisher: Wag! Worldwide Amalgamated Offshore Industries, Montreal
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical illustration of a pair of hands, with letterpress, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers. There is a small portrait illustration done in watercolor and pen and ink on a small square of wove paper, pasted to the colophon (p. 1); 96 pp.
medium: Color-and-black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress, pen and ink, watercolor; bound volume
title: wag! 9
